title: Analog scanner not scanning
description: Analog scanner was not scanning during last attempt; needs investigation.

title: Remove Nissan Stadium profile from analog scanner profiles and UI
description: Remove Nissan Stadium profile from analog scanner profiles and the UI.

title: Update git on the pi so pushes are faster
description: Git already up to date on Pi; remote operations are fast (ls-remote ~0.45s).

title: Avoids work and output somewhere
description: Avoids confirmed in JSON; UI now shows avoids count and sample for active profile.

title: New design for gain/sq sliders
description: Something lager on the screen esp for iphone ui. Also adjust graduation to the real rtl-sdr gain steps and make the sq a simeple 1-10 scale.

title: Last hit not updating in UI
description: Last hit pill shows but does not update; verify logging and data source.

title: what does refresh button on ui do?
description: Refresh button now documented and tooltip added; it syncs status and sliders without restarting.

title: is the squelch working properly?
description: Airband profile: gain <20 and squelch at 8 yields lots of noise pops; traffic sounds scratchy (may be location).Need higher gain but squelch at 9-10 does not suppress noise. Check if other profiles show same behavior.

title: Two columns on the ui for profiles
description: Profiles now render in two-column grid cards with single selection; radio inputs removed.

title: optimize for speed
description: Profile and apply endpoints now skip restart when no changes; UI avoids redundant profile restarts; remaining latency likely rtl_airband restart time.

title: Clean up noisy scan output
description: rtl-airband service uses wrapper script to strip control codes and sanitize logs.

title: change to last hit when empty
description: Last hit now shows "No hits yet" when empty; last-hit pill text centered.

title: UI up but no streams play
description: UI loads but audio streams do not play; user was on the wrong LAN.

title: Scanner UI flapping red/green due to RTL-SDR busy
description: rtl-airband failing to open device; trunk-recorder-staging was holding RTL2838. Stopped and disabled trunk-recorder-staging so rtl-airband owns the dongle.

title: Confirm restart button functionality in UI
description: Verify what the restart button does and confirm expected behavior in the UI.

title: Keepalive broken
description: Icecast keepalive appears broken. Note: while keepalive is broken
column7: change squelch) to when http://192.168.1.124:8000/GND.mp3 stops playing in browser is ~20 seconds. Notes: keepalive source is up; Icecast shows /keepalive.mp3 mount active; password 062352 confirmed. Icecast logs show fallback triggered on rtl-airband restart; audible delay matches client buffering. Keepalive updated to 8000 Hz mono to match /GND.mp3. Pi commands: journalctl -u icecast-keepalive -n 200 --no-pager; systemctl status icecast-keepalive; tail -f /var/log/icecast2/error.log /var/log/icecast2/access.log; curl -s http://127.0.0.1:8000/status-json.xsl | jq '.icestats.source[] | {mount

title: Verify GMRS hits are recorded
description: Add test to confirm hits are recorded for GMRS profile.

title: Live hit list page with time and duration
description: Live hit list page added with last 20 hits
column8: and duration; Last Hit pill opens page with back arrow; parser fixed for journal timezone format.

title: Hit list duration appears too long
description: Duration now inferred from Activity-on bursts with a 10s gap reset; newest hits shown first; note that this is not true squelch open/close timing.

title: Drive last hit and hit list from Icecast metadata
description: Last hit pill and hit list now read Icecast metadata; numeric titles supported; journal fallback remains when metadata is unavailable.

title: Optimize systemd and Icecast for faster restarts and reconnections
description: Tuned rtl-airband systemd service for fast stops (TimeoutStopSec=1
column7: RestartSec=0); changed ExecStart to direct rtl_airband binary for direct control; reduced Icecast source-timeout to 1s for quicker reconnections.

title: Change last hit frequency should show 000.000 format
description: Last hit frequency shows in 000.000 format. 3 digits on either side of decimal.
